an10.110:4.1: “Mendicants, these ten qualities should be blown away.
an10.110:4.3: For one of right view, wrong view is blown away.
an10.110:4.4: And the many bad, unwholesome qualities produced by wrong view are blown away.
an10.110:4.5: And because of right view, many wholesome qualities are developed to perfection.
an10.110:5.1: For one of right motivation, wrong motivation is blown away. …
an10.110:5.2: For one of right speech, wrong speech is blown away. …
an10.110:5.3: For one of right action, wrong action is blown away. …
an10.110:5.4: For one of right livelihood, wrong livelihood is blown away. …
an10.110:5.5: For one of right effort, wrong effort is blown away. …
an10.110:5.6: For one of right mindfulness, wrong mindfulness is blown away. …
an10.110:5.7: For one of right samādhi, wrong samādhi is blown away. …
an10.110:5.8: For one of right knowledge, wrong knowledge is blown away. …
an10.110:6.1: For one of right freedom, wrong freedom is blown away.
an10.110:6.2: And the many bad, unwholesome qualities produced by wrong freedom are blown away.
an10.110:6.3: And because of right freedom, many wholesome qualities are developed to perfection.
an10.110:6.4: These are the ten qualities that should be blown away.”
